attributes.action: STOP ISRAEL FROM THE HEARTACHE THEY ARE CAUSING IN PALESTINE
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: THE TERROR ISRAEL HAVE CAUSED THE PALESTINIANS HAS GONE ON FOR TOO LONG IT HAS TO BE STOPPED. THE PALESTINIANS ARE BEING HARSHLY TREATED IN THEIR OWN COUNTRY JUST IMAGINE SOMEONE DOING THAT TO THE UK STOPPING THE FOOD SUPPLIES ENTERING THE COUNTRY. I THOUGHT THE GOVERNMENT STOOD FOR PEACE AND EQUALITY.PM WE ASK YOU TO PLEASE HELP STOP THE VIOLENCE.BRING JUSTICE!!

rejection.details:
Please supply full name and address information.

Please address the excessive use of capital letters; they make your petition hard to read.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
False or incomplete name or address information
